channel.title: Dedicated Server! HELP
channel.description:
Well, i just bought a dedicated server from Godaddy around 5 days ago and when i run my server only 3-4 people can log onto the server... Any ideas on how to fix this?
I tried this
java -Xmx500m -cp . server
When i try running the server with that it says it can not find the interval and its unknown or something, wait ill get a picture...
I know this Isn't my server causing these problems because when i host the server tons of people can log onto the server, also the max connections on my p server is 500...
I normally run the dedicated server by opening my ssh client and typing "cd ~/server" then i type "java server". When i close the ssh client on my desktop the server stops so this means my computer has to be on 24/7 too?
My msn is: coolmanawesome1@hotmail.com (I'm currently off line)

next time find out how to b4 u buy it

Well, i just bought a dedicated server from Godaddy around 5 days ago and when i run my server only 3-4 people can log onto the server… Any ideas on how to fix this?
